step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Create a text layer.=Create a text layer.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap the keyboard icon to enter or change the text.=Tap the keyboard icon to enter or change the text.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap and scroll to change the typeface.=Tap and scroll to change the typeface.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Color dot. Touch rainbow gradient to select new color.=Tap Color dot. Touch rainbow gradient to select new color.
$$$/Tutorial/Drag on the handles to resize and move the text as desired. Tap OK.=Drag on the handles to resize and move the text as desired. Tap OK.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Effects > Basic > Drop Shadow.=Tap Effects > Basic > Drop Shadow.
$$$/Tutorial/Adjust settings to your taste. Tap Apply.=Adjust settings to your taste. Tap Apply.
